typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		key as string,
		fare_amount as string,
		pickup_datetime as string,
		pickup_longitude as string,
		pickup_latitude as string,
		dropoff_longitude as string,
		dropoff_latitude as string,
		passenger_count as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		key,
		fare_amount,
		pickup_datetime,
		pickup_longitude,
		pickup_latitude,
		dropoff_longitude,
		dropoff_latitude,
		passenger_count
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(input(
		age as string,
		job as string,
		marital as string,
		education as string,
		default as string,
		housing as string,
		loan as string,
		contact as string,
		month as string,
		day_of_week as string,
		duration as string,
		campaign as string,
		pdays as string,
		previous as string,
		poutcome as string,
		{emp.var.rate} as string,
		{cons.price.idx} as string,
		{cons.conf.idx} as string,
		euribor3m as string,
		{nr.employed} as string,
		y as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
